content.html: Hey!! Technical writers!! People who do documentation!! I’m a baby in the field and want to know more! What books should I read? What conferences do y’all like? Are there online communities I can join?
content.value:
Hey!! Technical writers!! People who do documentation!!

I’m a baby in the field and want to know more! What books should I read? What conferences do y’all like? Are there online communities I can join?
